description: Mainstreaming biodiversity into Russia's energy sector policy and programmes: Preparatory phase

subproject.description: The objective of this Project Preparation Grant (PPG) is to develop a full project document for a UNDP/GEF project aimed at mainstreaming biodiversity conservation into Russia’s energy sector policies and operations
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: BD Mainstreaming into energy

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
